WorkItem.Description:
Test:
----
$reader = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createReader('Excel2007');
$excel = $reader->load('read.xlsx');
 
$writer = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($excel, 'PDF');
$writer->save('write.pdf');
 
$writer = PHPExcel_IOFactory::createWriter($excel, 'HTML');
$writer->save('write.html');
 
Expected result:
----
Rows heights are correct in PDF.
 
Actual result:
----
Rows heights are completely ignored by PDF writer.

HTML Output (write.html)
http://img188.imageshack.us/img188/8881/writehtml.png
 
Environment:
----
PHPExcel 1.6.7
